medical_history.chief_complaint: Epigastric pain that radiated to her back.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reports that after dinner, she had an episode of nausea and vomiting. She has been experiencing nausea and vomiting during pregnancy, which resolved a few weeks ago. The pain began right below her sternum with radiation to her back, wrapping around her lower ribs on the left side. This pain is constant and the patient mentions having had similar pain in the past, but never to this extent. She denies any fevers, diarrhea, or sick contacts; last bowel movement was 3 days ago.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Migraines with aura, reflux, issues with nausea and vomiting during pregnancy, previous surgeries including left breast lumpectomy.
